鉶字的基本解释

鉶
xíng
见“铏”。

鉶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xíng］
［《廣韻》户經切，平青，匣。］
“铏1”的繁体字。
(1)盛菜羹的器皿。古常用于祭祀。
(2)指盛于铏器中的羹。
(3)用同“硎”。磨刀石。

鉶字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鉶； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1303第13
【唐韻】戸經切【集韻】【韻會】乎經切，?音?。【說文】本作?。器也。【廣韻】祭器。【玉篇】羹器也。【周禮·天官·亨人】祭祀共大羹鉶羹。【註】羹加五味，盛以鉶器，故曰鉶羹。【儀禮·公食大夫禮】宰夫設鉶。【註】鉶，菜和羹之器。【疏】據羹在鉶言之，謂之鉶羹。據器言之，謂之鉶鼎。【前漢·司馬遷傳】堯舜飯土簋，歠土鉶。【註】鉶，瓦器也。【史記】省作?。　【集韻】或作䤯。通作銒。

Celebrity
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xíng］
["Guangyun" Household Jingqie, Pingqing, Xie. ]
"铏1" in traditional characters.
(1) A vessel for holding vegetable soup. In ancient times, it was often used for sacrifices.
(2) Refers to the soup held in the tongs.
(3) Use the same as "硎". Whetstone.
Celebrity

[Tang Yun] 戸经切 [Jiyun] [Yunhui] is about the jingqi, "yin?". [Said the text] This work?.器 also. [Guangyun] Sacrifice. [Jade articles] Soup utensils. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Heng Ren】sacrifice to a total of big soups. [Note] The soup is added with five flavors, and the soup is filled with a chopstick, so it is called a chopstick. 【Rituals·Public Food Doctor Ceremony】The butcher set up a celebrity. [Note] Cong, the device of vegetables and soup. 【Sparse】According to the words of the soup, it is called the soup. According to the device, it is called a dinging. [Previous Han·Sima Qian Biography] Yao and Shun Fan Tugui, Shu Tujia. [Note] Clang, pottery also. [Historical Records] Provincial work?.　【Jiyun】or Zuoqi. Pass for 銒.
